name: Trinket
headline: Trinket makes it easy for teachers and students to create, edit andâ¦
description:
Trinket is the easiest way to make your class website interactive.

Trinket's powerful open teaching platform lets teachers create, prepare, and teach their courses all in one place. Everything on Trinket is open licensed, so teachers can create the best course materials by finding and sharing their work for lesson plans/curriculum with others teaching the same thing.

raw_markdown="  * [ ![Trinket helps you teach with code](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/trinket-logo.png) ](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/>)

# Code is Your Canvas
[Sign Up for your Free Account](http://trinket.io/</sign-up>)
## Share Code from any Device
Trinket lets you run and write code in any browser, on any device. 
Trinkets work instantly, with no need to log in, download plugins, or install software. 
Easily share or embed the code with your changes when you're done. 
## Create Your Free Account
Let's get started! Your free account will let you create trinkets, see interaction statistics for each trinket you create, and more.
[![Sign In with Google](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/icons/google/btn_google_signin_dark_normal_web@2x.png)](http://trinket.io/</auth/google>)
[![](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/icons/clever/efb3f5d-LogInWithClever2x.png)](http://trinket.io/</auth/clever>)
or create account below
Sign Up!
## Free Interactive Resources
Trinket is proud to present the following free resources in collaboration with open source authors and our non-profit partners.
[ **Tutorials** ](http://trinket.io/<https:/hourofpython.com>) [ ![](https://hourofpython.com/img/blocks.png) From Blocks to Code Starting with Blocks, we look at the code underneath and learn some basics of Python! ](http://trinket.io/<https:/hourofpython.trinket.io/from-blocks-to-code-with-trinket>) [ ![](https://hourofpython.com/img/tinaenglish.png) Python with Turtles A visual introduction to code using the Python programming language and Turtles. ](http://trinket.io/<https:/hourofpython.trinket.io/a-visual-introduction-to-python>)
[ **Textbooks** ](http://trinket.io/<https:/books.trinket.io>) [ ![](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/books/thinkjava/cover.jpg) Think Java An introduction to Java suitable for AP Java classes. ](http://trinket.io/<https:/books.trinket.io/thinkjava>) [ ![](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/books/pfe/cover.png) Python for Everybody An introduction to Python suitable for a wide range of students. ](http://trinket.io/<https:/books.trinket.io/pfe>)
## Trinket Premium Plans
Designed with individual learners and educators in mind, premium plans offer more power and convenience.
[View Premium Plans](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/plans>)
## Trinket for Schools
View Trinket's solutions to get your classroom or entire school ready to code.
[Learn More about Trinket for Schools](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/schools>)
## Free Support for Educators
Educators are a key part of our mission. We offer free support to all verified educators and code club volunteers.
[Claim Your Educator Account](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/educators>)
[![trinket. the key to open teaching](http://trinket.io/cache-prefix-a35684d8/img/trinket-logo.png)](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/>)
©2015-2024 Trinket
#### About Us

  * [Blog](http://trinket.io/<http:/blog.trinket.io>)

#### Support
  * [FAQ](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/faq>)
  * [Help](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/help>)
  * [Contact Us](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/contact>)


#### Legal
  * [Terms of Service](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/tos>)
  * [Privacy](http://trinket.io/</trinket.io/privacy>)


#### Connect

generated_description:
**Trinket: Revolutionizing the Way Educators Teach**

Founded in 2013 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s Batch IK12, Trinket has emerged as a powerful ally for teachers and students alike. Based in Raleigh, NC, Trinket operates with a lean team of one, yet it packs a punch in the educational technology space.

**Core Mission**

At its core, Trinket is all about accessibility. They aim to make it easy for educators to create, edit, and manage interactive learning materials, particularly for code-based subjects. The evolution of Trinket from a simple class website builder to an open teaching platform is nothing short of impressive. Everything on Trinket is open-licensed, encouraging collaboration and sharing among educators worldwide. This not only fosters community but also elevates the quality of educational content available.

**What Makes Trinket Special?**

1. **User-Friendly Interface**: Trinket allows anyone to run and write code directly in any web browser without the hassle of installations or plugins. This immediate accessibility means teachers can focus on teaching, not technology.

2. **Resource Sharing**: Educators can find, share, and improve lesson plans and resources, helping each other enhance the classroom experience.

3. **Free Interactive Resources**: Trinket provides a suite of free resources, including tutorials like "From Blocks to Code" and textbooks suited for a range of students, such as *Python for Everybody* and *Think Java*.

4. **Support for Educators**: Understanding the pivotal role educators play, Trinket offers free support for verified teachers and code club volunteers, ensuring they have the tools they need to succeed.

5. **Flexible Plans**: For those looking for more features, Trinket offers premium plans designed to give individuals and educational institutions more power and convenience.

**Connecting and Engaging**

To foster creativity and collaboration, Trinket has features that allow educators to collect interaction statistics and manage their content seamlessly. This facilitates a truly dynamic learning environment where students can engage with coding interactively.

Whether you're a teacher wanting to spice up your curriculum, or a student eager to dive into coding, Trinket is ready to serve. With a website that’s constantly evolving and resources that are expanding, Trinket stands out in the educational landscape, ready to make learning both interactive and enjoyable.

Intrigued? Check it out for yourself at [trinket.io](http://trinket.io).
